text: Thomas Jackson Calvert , D.D. (1775–1840) was Norrisian Professor of Divinity from 1815 to 1824.Divinity, Cambridge Calvert was born in 1775; educated at Kirkham Grammar School and St John's College, Cambridge; and ordained in 1800. He held incumbencies at Holme-on-Spalding-Moor and Manchester Collegiate Church.Venn, John & Venn, John Archibald. Alumni Cantabrigienses: A Biographical List of All Known Students, Graduates and Holders of Office at the University of Cambridge, from the Earliest Times to 1900, Cambridge University Press Part II vol. i p495 He died on 4 June 1840.In our obituary will be found recorded the death of Thomas Calvert. The Times (London, England), Tuesday, Jun 09, 1840; pg. 6; Issue 17379 ==References== Category:1775 births Category:People educated at Kirkham Grammar School Category:Alumni of St John's College, Cambridge Category:Norrisian Professors of Divinity Category:1840 deaths Category:People from Holme-on-Spalding-Moor
title: Thomas Calvert
